articles.description: The actress, who is best known to viewers for playing Gabby Thomas, was flooded with compliments
articles.content: Emmerdale star Rosie Bentham was flooded with compliments as she showed off her 'nap face' in a social media selfie. The actress, who is best known to viewers for playing Gabby Thomas in the ITV soap… [+2429 chars]
